soft-diffusion: Gentle blending of light and shadow.
warm-glow: Golden or reddish light creating cozy warmth.
cool-tint: Bluish or greenish light for a cold atmosphere.
lens-flare: Streaks of light caused by reflections in the lens.
bloom: A soft glow that makes highlights appear radiant.
specular-highlights: Bright, reflective spots on shiny surfaces.
shadow-gradient: Gradual fading of shadows into light.
rim-lighting: Halo-like glow around the subject edges.
